Buttons

<div class="buttons buttons--left">

    <a class="button button--primary " href="#">First button</a>

    <a class="button button--secondary " href="#">Second button</a> </div>
 
{% if buttons|length %}
  <div class="buttons buttons--{{ align|default('left') }}">
    {% for button in buttons %}
      {% include '@fractal/button/button.twig' with {
        text: button.text,
        url: button.url,
        style: button.style
      } %}
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
{% endif %}
 
{
  "align": "left",
  "buttons": [
    {
      "text": "First button",
      "url": "#",
      "style": "primary"
    },
    {
      "text": "Second button",
      "url": "#",
      "style": "secondary"
    }
  ]
}
  • Content: 
    .button {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-accent-dark);
  border: solid 1px var(--color-primary-accent-dark);
  color: var(--color-primary-accent-light);
  display: inline-block;
  line-height: 1.1;
  margin: 0.5rem 0 0 0;
  padding: 0.4rem 1.2rem;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.button + .button {
  margin-left: 1rem;
}

.button--secondary {
  background-color: #000;
  border-color: #000;
  color: #fff;
}
  • URL: /components/raw/buttons/button.css
  • Filesystem Path: components/buttons/button.css
  • Size: 415 Bytes
  • Content: 
    .buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-flow: row wrap;
  margin: 1rem 0;
}

.buttons--left {
  justify-content: flex-start;
}

.buttons--center {
  justify-content: center;
}

.buttons--right {
  justify-content: flex-end;
}

.buttons--around {
  justify-content: space-around;
}

.buttons--between {
  justify-content: space-between;
}
  • URL: /components/raw/buttons/buttons.css
  • Filesystem Path: components/buttons/buttons.css
  • Size: 333 Bytes
  • Handle: @buttons
  • Variants (5): Left , Center , Right , Around , Between
